divs: Sighting DetailsWhile driving down interstate 84, UFO appeared momentarily like a star then shoot forward leaving a trail before disappearing. Thought it was a shooting star or plane but was below cloud cover and way too fast to be a plane (plus no tail lights or shape). UFO traveled in line with highway, we lost sight of it when it simply disapeared. Again, the best way I can describe it was a very low shooting star...but much faster and brighter.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Southbury
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: UFO appeared like low flying shooting star
